test_code_analysis: The tests verify the login functionality of the auth controller, covering scenarios of successful login, invalid credentials, and various invalid input cases such as missing username or password, no data provided, and invalid JSON format.
The tests verify the behavior of a login endpoint in various scenarios, including successful and failed login attempts, as well as missing or invalid input data.

The tests cover the account lockout functionality during login attempts, verifying success scenarios, account lock conditions, invalid credentials, and various cases of missing or empty user ID and password fields.
